mapper.select: select rl.lab_name as rl_lab_name, rl.research_direction as rl_research_direction, s.secretary_id as s_secretary_id, s.name as s_name, s.gender as s_gender, s.birth as s_birth, s.employ_date as s_employ_date, s.remit as s_remit, d.lab_name as d_lab_name, d.researcher_id as d_researcher_id, d.appointment_date as d_appointment_date, d.term_date as d_term_date, os.site_id, os.space_area, os.address, os.lab_name, sr.researcher_id, sr.name, sr.gender, sr.birth, sr.title, sr.research_direction, sr.lab_name from research_laboratory rl left join secretary s on rl.secretary_id = s.secretary_id left join director d on rl.lab_name = d.lab_name left join office_space os on rl.lab_name = os.lab_name left join scientific_researcher sr on rl.lab_name = sr.lab_name where rl.lab_name = #{labName}
mapper.update: update research_laboratory set secretary_id = null where secretary_id = #{secretaryId}
